web.name: JardinDeTara
web.desc: Web site for the company Jardin De Tara, a privater landscape gardener near Aix en Provence. This is no longuer the one used for commercial front end, but the project was nevertheless pretty interesting.

web.name: Resto
web.desc: A web site for a Restorer in Aix en Provence, "Les Agapges chez Gilou". Never got paid for this, but the project was almost finished.

web.name: Coach
web.desc: A web site for an Energy-Therapist in Aix en Provence. Order got cancelled two weeks before delivery.

web.name: Epic Heroes TCG
web.desc: Personal projet, the aim was to create rules for a card game, based on a mobile app based on a web serie based on World Of Warcraft !

web.name: Equi-m
web.desc: A web site for Equi-m, an equi-therapist near Aix en Provence.
